index_description: A focus on creating immersive experiences on the web.
index_keywords: Zun Creative, freelance developer, Amsterdam, 3D websites
blog_description: Read the latest articles about me.
hero_sequence_slide1_description: Building worlds you don't just click away. With 3D, a website gets character, a feeling, something people truly remember.
hero_sequence_slide2_description: Your mouse becomes a magic wand in an enchanting digital world. Every element responds to your touch, and together we create an experience that continues to move you.
hero_sequence_slide3_description: No hassle, no downloads, 3D on the web opens doors with a single click. For everyone, everywhere, instantly accessible and ready to fascinate.
services_section_intro: I am Sem, a web developer with over 15 years of experience from Amsterdam. I create audiovisual websites and web applications that are fast, accessible, and user-friendly. My focus is on creating an unforgettable user experience through modern technologies and design principles.
services_section_ai_description: Everything can be accelerated, improved, and personalized with Artificial Intelligence. I apply it in all my recent work.
services_section_ar_description: You won't forget experiences with Augmented Reality; combined with the latest AI trends, you can offer a personal experience.
services_section_3d_description: An audiovisual experience can be had directly in your browser with a single click. A cinematic story that is accessible to everyone.
contact_section_description: For questions about my work or to discuss a project, do not hesitate to get in touch.
